ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Anyone else a bad fashion statement like me?
ygData.msgSnippet: the one thing I ve discovered is that everything looks good when you re an erudite. I m currently wearing Frog crown Imbrued Vamb Hero Bracer SS gaunts SS
ygData.messageBody:
the one thing I've discovered is that everything looks good when you're an
erudite.

I'm currently wearing

Frog crown
Imbrued Vamb
Hero Bracer
SS gaunts
SS boots
Lambent Legs
Lambent BP

For erudite form I switch frog crown for SSB.

I'm hoping to pick up imbrued leggings or dark scale greaves at which point
I'll switch to EBCP or Kylong BP or, if both of those look bad, somthing
else.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Friday, November 03, 2000 12:48 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Anyone else a bad fashion statement like me?


heh i have a combo that looks amazingly ok.

singing steel gloves, boots
hero bracer
lambent legs, arms
enamelled black chestplate

the black with gold and green trim actually looked kinda cool (well in my
opinion
anyway, heh)

At 11:29 AM 11/3/00 -0500, you wrote:
>We should have an "Ugly bards of Norrath Unite" event hehe
>
>Minkin
